data.persona: I am an infant fly. I eat rotting flesh. I grow large and will soon become something else.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
The prisoner and the spider are here.

You are carrying a rotten flesh.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to kill the spider
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to grow into a full-grown fly
data.long_motivation: I'm going to lay eggs in an animal carcass and perpetuate my wonderful species
